task.name: invgain
task.description:
This program will overwrite the gain solutions in a caltable with their inverse. The application in mind is direction-dependent calibration, e.g. for peeling.
Christopher A. Hales Version 1.2 (tested with CASA Version 4.7.0) 13 October 2016
Code available at: http://github.com/chrishales/invgain invgain is released under a BSD 3-Clause License; see LICENSE for details.

param.name: spw
param.description: spectral window index number (blank for all)

task.example:
----- Detailed description of keyword arguments -----
Keyword arguments:
By default this program will invert all gains in a caltable. While this version of invgain supports parameter selection, it does not support multiple index selection (e.g. spw='0,2'). In this case, simply rerun invgain for each index separately.
